main.slogan: Grows Bitcoin safe & easy on the trustable investment platform
introduction.holders.title: Designed for Holders
introduction.holders.description: Using DeFis could be overwhelming. As most platforms target technical users, they overuse jargon and dazzling information. SeFo, on the other hand, aims to create a seamless experience for people who have little time to make long-term investments. We recreate user flows in DeFi and focus on building an accessible system.
introduction.invest.title: Self-custody Invest
introduction.invest.description: Fully controlling your asset is the safest way to manage wealth. In 2022, the whole world witnessed the devastating collapse of crypto unicorns due to bad custodial management, causing over $8.2B loss to individual investors. It is time for people to have the right to safeguard themselves in crypto investment and to earn reliable yields by unleashing the power of blockchain.
introduction.strategy.title: Auto-farming Strategy
introduction.strategy.description: SeFo provides one-stop services to grow your asset. The vault generates yields by providing liquidity in the liquidity pool on trusted services; it also reinvests the rewards automatically to maximize the compounding effect. The strategy is not only designed to make profits but also save you from tedious manual operations, potential human error, and overpaying gas fees.
investmentIntro.title: Invest Bitcoin in 3 Steps
investmentIntro.step1.title: Buy & Store Bitcoin
investmentIntro.step1.content: You can now buy bitcoin right on crypto exchange using fiat currency. Then you can connect your wallet here to earn incredible yeilds.
investmentIntro.step2.title: Build your Portfolio
investmentIntro.step2.content: Deposit to Bitcoin vault to grow your assets.
investmentIntro.step3.title: Earn Trustuble Yields
investmentIntro.step3.content: Withdraw your asset and earn bitcoin yields anytime, anywhere. Investment flexibility is the key to maximize your wealth and to make it sustainable.
